title: 3 and Out - Bears Blow it; Flooded WR Market; Bigtime NFL TV Deal Bank $$$; Top Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Bears Blow it; Flooded WR Market; Bigtime NFL TV Deal Bank $$$; Top Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John looks at the Bears and Seahawks failing to get the big deal done for Russell Wilson, why a crowded free agent wide receiver market is making it harder for pass catchers to fetch top dollar, what the NFL's massive new $100 billion TV deal means for the league and the other major sports. He also looks at the top headlines from around the league and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
